body.html: We are a beacon of commitment towards preserving our forests. In the embrace of nature, we stand steadfast, advocating for the voiceless sentinels of our ecosystem. Together, we forge a path towards a greener tomorrow.
body.markdown: We are a beacon of commitment towards preserving our forests. In the embrace of nature, we stand steadfast, advocating for the voiceless sentinels of our ecosystem. Together, we forge a path towards a greener tomorrow.

body.html: Eager to leave a green footprint? Lend your hands to Lorem Ipsum Dolor. Each seed you sow, every forest you help clean, and every conversation you initiate about the importance of trees, echoes in our mission. Every action matters!
body.markdown: Eager to leave a green footprint? Lend your hands to Lorem Ipsum Dolor. Each seed you sow, every forest you help clean, and every conversation you initiate about the importance of trees, echoes in our mission. Every action matters!

description.html: Dive into a world full of hidden mysteries and breathtaking views. Explore the unexplored corners of the Earth from the comfort of your own home.
description.markdown: Dive into a world full of hidden mysteries and breathtaking views. Explore the unexplored corners of the Earth from the comfort of your own home.

content.title: BillionTrees Project
content.description: We're on a mission to save the trees

content.html:
ProtonVerse is a family friendly metaverse with assets secured on Bitcoin blockchain. Using VR (virtual reality) AR (augmented reality) and spacial computing technologies, together with state of the art game creation tools and Web3 payments platform, users will construct virtual spaces for people to meet; connect with friends; to build, buy, sell and rent virtual property and run their own businesses within the ProtonVerse.

Opportunities for real-time interactions by audio, text, avatar, motion capture or other means will be provided but the choice whether or not to engage will be up to the individual or group.
content.markdown:
ProtonVerse is a family friendly metaverse with assets secured on Bitcoin blockchain. Using VR (virtual reality) AR (augmented reality) and spacial computing technologies, together with state of the art game creation tools and Web3 payments platform, users will construct virtual spaces for people to meet; connect with friends; to build, buy, sell and rent virtual property and run their own businesses within the ProtonVerse.

Opportunities for real-time interactions by audio, text, avatar, motion capture or other means will be provided but the choice whether or not to engage will be up to the individual or group.

en.heading: ProtonVerse: a family friendly non-profit platform

quote.html: “With the metaverse we are transitioning from viewing a 2D world looking at the Internet to living inside the Internet in a 3D world.”
quote.markdown: “With the metaverse we are transitioning from viewing a 2D world looking at the Internet to living inside the Internet in a 3D world.”

body.html: Enhance the world around you by adding visual experiences that add to your normal surroundings.
body.markdown: Enhance the world around you by adding visual experiences that add to your normal surroundings.

body.html: All chat messages are 256 bit encrypted to preserve and protect private communications.
body.markdown: All chat messages are 256 bit encrypted to preserve and protect private communications.

content.html: Our mission is to provide a social, entertainment platform that allows rich experiences and interactions. ProtonVerse LLC is a 501(c)3 non-profit. All donations are tax deductible.
content.markdown: Our mission is to provide a social, entertainment platform that allows rich experiences and interactions.  ProtonVerse LLC is a 501(c)3 non-profit. All donations are tax deductible.

en.heading: To Preserve the best of our humanity

content.html:
Join us on our mission

Through awareness, education, and direct action, we're working to combat climate change and protect our precious ecosystems. Together, we can make a difference.

Since our founding, we've been at the forefront of environmental conservation. Our dedicated team of scientists, activists, and volunteers works tirelessly to protect endangered species, restore critical habitats, and educate the public about the urgency of climate action.
content.markdown:
# Join us on our mission

 Through awareness, education, and direct action, we're working to combat climate change and protect our precious ecosystems. Together, we can make a difference.

Since our founding, we've been at the forefront of environmental conservation. Our dedicated team of scientists, activists, and volunteers works tirelessly to protect endangered species, restore critical habitats, and educate the public about the urgency of climate action.

code.html: {@html content.html}

content.html:
heading 1

Overall, our calendar software is the perfect tool for managing your time and staying organized. With its user-friendly interface and powerful search functionality, it's the ideal solution for anyone looking to take control of their schedule and make the most of their time.

heading 2

Additionally, our software integrates seamlessly with popular email services,

so that users can easily invite others and receive updates about events.

heading 3

Try it out today and see the difference for yourself. Overall, our calendar software is a comprehensive and effective tool for managing your time.

Some interesting quote info
content.markdown:
# heading 1

Overall, our calendar software is the *perfect tool* for managing your time and staying organized. With its user-friendly interface and powerful search functionality, it's the ideal solution for anyone looking to take control of their schedule and make the most of their time.

## heading 2

Additionally, our software integrates seamlessly with <mark>popular email services,</mark>

 so that users can easily invite others and receive updates about events.

### heading 3

Try it out today and see the difference for yourself. Overall, our calendar software is a comprehensive and effective tool for managing your time.

> Some interesting quote info
